SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
SALESFORCE ORDER MANAGEMENT
Alternative Payment Method Fields

The Alternative Payment Method object represents a payment method that doesn’t have a defined Commerce Orders object, such as Card Payment Method or Digital Wallet.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available in: Lightning Experience
Available in: Enterprise, Unlimited, and Developer Editions
NOTE Depending on your page layout and field-level security settings, some fields aren’t visible or editable.

This table lists the fields on the Alternative Payment Method object.

FIELD LABEL	DESCRIPTION
Account	The account for the alternative payment method.
Audit Email	The email address of the alternative payment method owner.
Comments	Comments about the alternative payment method.
Company Name	The company name for the alternative payment method.
Gateway Token	The tokenized form of the alternative payment method, returned by the gateway.
Gateway Token Details	The unique tokenized ID generated by the payment gateway when the alternative payment method first interacts with the gateway. The ID identifies the alternative payment method during future transactions.
IP Address	The IP address for the alternative payment method owner.
MAC Address	The MAC address of the user who initiated the payment.
Nickname	The nickname for the alternative payment method.
Owner Name	The user who owns the alternative payment method record.
Payment Gateway	The ID of the payment gateway entity used to handle transactions from the alternative payment method.
Payment Method Address	The user address column type. First name and last name are listed as separate fields.
Phone	The phone number of the alternative payment method owner.
Processing Mode	

Indicates whether the alternative payment method was created in Salesforce or externally.

Possible values are:

External—Indicates that the alternative payment method record was created by a method other than Commerce Payments Connect API.
Salesforce - Indicates that the alternative payment method record was created by Commerce Payments Connect API.

Registered Email	The email address of the alternative payment method owner.
Status	

The status of the alternative payment method.

Possible values are:

Active - The payment platform can use the alternative payment method to make payments. Active alternative payment methods can’t be deleted.
Canceled - The payment platform can’t use the payment method to make payments. A value of Canceled can’t be changed to Active or Inactive.
InActive - The payment platform can’t use the payment method to make payments. A value of InActive can be changed to Active or Canceled.
